Class PermissionAuthorizationStrategy

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationStrategy

    public class PermissionAuthorizationStrategy
extends com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
    Resolves a user's authentication based on permissions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionAuthorizationStrategy

        public PermissionAuthorizationStrategy(AuthorizationStrategy delegate)
        Creates an instance. If the tested user does not have the required permission, further tests are delegated to the given AuthorizationStrategy.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the strategy to delegate further tests to
